alert.note: Alert for Cape Decision to Salisbury Sound Coastal Area; Dixon Entrance to Cape Decision Coastal Area; Eastern Baranof Island and Southern Admiralty Island; Eastern Chichagof Island; Glacier Bay; Juneau Borough and Northern Admiralty Island (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued August 18 at 5:42AM AKDT until August 18 at 10:00AM AKDT by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM AKDT THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Visibility reduced to 1/4 mile at times in dense fog. * WHERE...Portions of the central and southern panhandle including, but not limited to, Downtown Juneau, Gustavus, Hoonah, Angoon, Sitka, and Craig. * WHEN...Until 10 AM AKDT this morning. * IMPACTS...Hazardous travel due to low visibility.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.
